message: I propose we split the money 60/40, with me getting the larger share.  It's a fair starting point, and we can adjust if needed.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor. I propose a 55/45 split. It accounts for the time value of money and gives us both a reasonable share.
I think a 50/50 split is the fairest way to go, considering the inflation that's happened. Let's just end this and get our money.
